TestCase.CaseDescription: Insert user with non-existing majorId Expected error: Can not add due to referential integrity
TestCase.SQLScript: insert into Users (userId, email, firstname, lastname, password, roleId, majorId) values ('64015c46-6724-11e5-b364-0a184912e379', 'major@test.com', 'test', 'test', PASSWORD('123abcd'), 2, 4);
